verbs.description: New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick [V: was] named a member of President Donald Trump 's " Council on Sport , Fitness , and Nutrition , " the White House announced Friday morning . The council also includes former Yankees pitcher Mariano Rivera and former Heisman winner Herschel Walker .
